import { CodeComponent } from '@/pages/components/code.component'
import DocsLayout from '@/layouts/docs.layout'
import ComponentLayout from '@/layouts/component.layout'
import React from 'react'
import { Badge, View } from '@fold-dev/core'

export const docs = {
    title: 'Badge',
    subtitle: 'The Badge serves as a small label or indicator for UI elements.',
    description:
        'The Badge component is useful for conveying important information the user should be aware of, such as unread message counts, notifications, etc. It should be in close proximity to the relative element.',
}

```tsx
import { Badge } from "@fold-dev/core";
```

### Usage

export const Usage = () => (<View row gap={5} width="fit-content">
        <Badge>+34 notifications</Badge>
        <Badge bordered>+12 bordered notifications</Badge>
    </View>);

<div className="story-block">
<Usage />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="BasicUsage.tsx" code="ZXhwb3J0IGNvbnN0IFVzYWdlID0gKCkgPT4gKAogICAgPFZpZXcKICAgICAgICByb3cKICAgICAgICBnYXA9ezV9CiAgICAgICAgd2lkdGg9ImZpdC1jb250ZW50Ij4KICAgICAgICA8QmFkZ2U+KzM0IG5vdGlmaWNhdGlvbnM8L0JhZGdlPgogICAgICAgIDxCYWRnZSBib3JkZXJlZD4rMTIgYm9yZGVyZWQgbm90aWZpY2F0aW9uczwvQmFkZ2U+CiAgICA8L1ZpZXc+Cik=" />

```tsx
export const Usage = () => (
    <View
        row
        gap={5}
        width="fit-content">
        <Badge>+34 notifications</Badge>
        <Badge bordered>+12 bordered notifications</Badge>
    </View>
)
```
### Variants

export const Variants = () => (<View row gap={5} width="fit-content">
        <Badge>default</Badge>
        <Badge variant="accent">accent</Badge>
        <Badge variant="success">success</Badge>
        <Badge variant="neutral">neutral</Badge>
        <Badge variant="caution">caution</Badge>
        <Badge variant="warning">warning</Badge>
        <Badge variant="danger">danger</Badge>
    </View>);

<div className="story-block">
<Variants />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Variants.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Variants = () => (
    <View
        row
        gap={5}
        width="fit-content">
        <Badge>default</Badge>
        <Badge variant="accent">accent</Badge>
        <Badge variant="success">success</Badge>
        <Badge variant="neutral">neutral</Badge>
        <Badge variant="caution">caution</Badge>
        <Badge variant="warning">warning</Badge>
        <Badge variant="danger">danger</Badge>
    </View>
)
```
### Variants Bordered

export const VariantsBordered = () => (<View row gap={5} width="fit-content">
        <Badge bordered>default</Badge>
        <Badge variant="accent" bordered>
            accent
        </Badge>
        <Badge variant="success" bordered>
            success
        </Badge>
        <Badge variant="neutral" bordered>
            neutral
        </Badge>
        <Badge variant="caution" bordered>
            caution
        </Badge>
        <Badge variant="warning" bordered>
            warning
        </Badge>
        <Badge variant="danger" bordered>
            danger
        </Badge>
    </View>);

<div className="story-block">
<VariantsBordered />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="VariantsBordered.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const VariantsBordered = () => (
    <View
        row
        gap={5}
        width="fit-content">
        <Badge bordered>default</Badge>
        <Badge
            variant="accent"
            bordered>
            accent
        </Badge>
        <Badge
            variant="success"
            bordered>
            success
        </Badge>
        <Badge
            variant="neutral"
            bordered>
            neutral
        </Badge>
        <Badge
            variant="caution"
            bordered>
            caution
        </Badge>
        <Badge
            variant="warning"
            bordered>
            warning
        </Badge>
        <Badge
            variant="danger"
            bordered>
            danger
        </Badge>
    </View>
)
```
### Sizes

export const Sizes = () => (<View row gap={5} width="fit-content">
        <Badge size="xs">extra small</Badge>
        <Badge size="sm">small</Badge>
        <Badge size="md">medium</Badge>
        <Badge size="lg">large</Badge>
        <Badge size="xl">extra large</Badge>
    </View>);

<div className="story-block">
<Sizes />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Sizes.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Sizes = () => (
    <View
        row
        gap={5}
        width="fit-content">
        <Badge size="xs">extra small</Badge>
        <Badge size="sm">small</Badge>
        <Badge size="md">medium</Badge>
        <Badge size="lg">large</Badge>
        <Badge size="xl">extra large</Badge>
    </View>
)
```
### Indicator

> When the Badge component has no children, it reverts to becoming an indicator.

export const Indicator = () => (<View row gap={5} width="fit-content">
        <Badge variant="success" size="xs"/>
        <Badge variant="success" size="sm"/>
        <Badge variant="success" size="md"/>
        <Badge variant="success" size="lg"/>
        <Badge variant="success" size="xl"/>
    </View>);

<div className="story-block">
<Indicator />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Indicator.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Indicator = () => (
    <View
        row
        gap={5}
        width="fit-content">
        <Badge
            variant="success"
            size="xs"
        />
        <Badge
            variant="success"
            size="sm"
        />
        <Badge
            variant="success"
            size="md"
        />
        <Badge
            variant="success"
            size="lg"
        />
        <Badge
            variant="success"
            size="xl"
        />
    </View>
)
```
### Position

export const Position = () => (<View width={100} height={100} bgToken="surface-strong" position="relative">
        <Badge variant="accent" anchor="top-left" bordered/>
        <Badge variant="success" anchor="top-right" bordered/>
        <Badge variant="neutral" anchor="bottom-left" bordered/>
        <Badge variant="warning" anchor="bottom-right" bordered/>
    </View>);

<div className="story-block">
<Position />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Position.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Position = () => (
    <View
        width={100}
        height={100}
        bgToken="surface-strong"
        position="relative">
        <Badge
            variant="accent"
            anchor="top-left"
            bordered
        />
        <Badge
            variant="success"
            anchor="top-right"
            bordered
        />
        <Badge
            variant="neutral"
            anchor="bottom-left"
            bordered
        />
        <Badge
            variant="warning"
            anchor="bottom-right"
            bordered
        />
    </View>
)
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
